content: I've harvested some <style=Highlight>{奖励作物}</style>. Can you smell it mah~? Super fresh! Washed one and tried it myself... How's the taste, mah? Here, have a taste~!
info: NPC特色交互-云果-送作物_云果

content: Tried some, and it's really good. Wanna taste this <style=Highlight>{奖励作物}</style> too~? Here, have one.
info: NPC特色交互-云果-送作物_云果

content: Today mah... what a great harvest~! Crops 'n veggies I've been growin'... they've grown so well... could smell their delicious scent from miles away.
info: NPC特色交互-云果-送作物_云果

content: {A害羞冒烟}Well mah, if... if you're interested, I'd like ya to try some <style=Highlight>[noun:2,{奖励作物}]</style>. Would ya, mah~?
info: NPC特色交互-云果-送作物_云果

content: {A沉醉闻}Can ya smell it mah? Freshly picked crops 'n grains from the field. I've just finished washin' 'em.
info: NPC特色交互-云果-送作物_云果
